elements.name: image1
lightSlider
elements.title: Izvēlies sev viss patīkamāko fona spilgtumu.

elements.name: code
elements.html:
<script>
    function getSliderByName(name) {
        return document.querySelector(`[data-name=${name}] input`);
    }

    function setImgColor(hue, saturation, light, imgId = 'img-bg') {
        var imgSlider = document.getElementById('img-bg');
        imgSlider.style.backgroundColor = hslToHex(hue.value, saturation.value, light.value);
    }

    function hslToHex(h, s, l) {
        l /= 100;
        const a = s * Math.min(l, 1 - l) / 100;
        const f = n => {
            const k = (n + h / 30) % 12;
            const color = l - a * Math.max(Math.min(k - 3, 9 - k, 1), -1);
            return Math.round(255 * color).toString(16).padStart(2, '0'); // convert to Hex and prefix "0" if needed
        };
        return `#${f(0)}${f(8)}${f(4)}`;
    }

    var lightSlider = getSliderByName('lightSlider');
    lightSlider.addEventListener('change', (e) => {
        setImgColor({
            value: 0
        }, {
            value: 0
        }, e.target);
    });

    setImgColor({
        value: 0
    }, {
        value: 0
    }, lightSlider);
</script>

elements.name: hueSlider3
elements.title: Izvēlies sev viss patīkamāko toni trešajam attēlam.

elements.name: code
elements.html:
<script>
    function getSliderByName(name) {
        return document.querySelector(`[data-name=${name}] input`);
    }

    function setImgColor(hue, saturation, light, imgId = 'img-bg') {
        var imgSlider = document.getElementById(imgId);
        console.debug([imgSlider, hue, saturation, light, imgId, hslToHex(hue.value, saturation.value, light.value)]);
        imgSlider.style.backgroundColor = hslToHex(hue.value, saturation.value, light.value);
    }

    function hslToHex(h, s, l) {
        l /= 100;
        const a = s * Math.min(l, 1 - l) / 100;
        const f = n => {
            const k = (n + h / 30) % 12;
            const color = l - a * Math.max(Math.min(k - 3, 9 - k, 1), -1);
            return Math.round(255 * color).toString(16).padStart(2, '0'); // convert to Hex and prefix "0" if needed
        };
        return `#${f(0)}${f(8)}${f(4)}`;
    }

    for (var i = 1; i < 4; i++) {
        const hueSlider = getSliderByName('hueSlider' + i);
        const ii = i;

        hueSlider.addEventListener('change', (e) => {
            console.debug(ii);
            setImgColor(e.target, {
                value: 50
            }, {
                value: ii * 10 - 5
            }, 'img-bg' + ii);
        });

        setImgColor(hueSlider, {
            value: 50
        }, {
            value: i * 10 - 5
        }, 'img-bg' + i);
    }
</script>

elements.name: code
elements.html:
<script>
    function getSliderByName(name) {
        return document.querySelector(`[data-name=${name}] input`);
    }

    function setImgOpacity(slider, imgId = 'img-bg') {
        var imgSlider = document.getElementById(imgId);
        imgSlider.style.opacity = slider.value;
    }

    for (var i = 1; i < 4; i++) {
        const lightSlider = getSliderByName('lightSliderFg' + i);
        const ii = i;

        lightSlider.addEventListener('change', (e) => {
            setImgOpacity(e.target, 'img-bg-fg' + ii);
        });

        setImgOpacity(lightSlider, 'img-bg-fg' + i);
    }
</script>

elements.name: code
elements.html:
<script>
    function getSliderByName(name) {
        return document.querySelector(`[data-name=${name}] input`);
    }

    function setImgOpacity(slider, imgId = 'img-bg') {
        var imgSlider = document.getElementById(imgId);
        imgSlider.style.filter = `saturate(${slider.value})`;
    }

    for (var i = 1; i < 4; i++) {
        const lightSlider = getSliderByName('saturationAccentSlider' + i);
        const ii = i;

        lightSlider.addEventListener('change', (e) => {
            setImgOpacity(e.target, 'img-accent' + ii);
        });

        setImgOpacity(lightSlider, 'img-accent' + i);
    }
</script>

elements.name: question2
elements.html:
<script>
    function getSliderByName(name) {
        return document.querySelector(`[data-name=${name}] input`);
    }

    function setCssVar(id, value) {
        console.debug([id, value.value]);
        document.documentElement.style.setProperty(`--prompt-col${id}`, value.value);
    }


    for (var i = 1; i < 5; i++) {
        const promptColor = getSliderByName('promptColor' + i);
        const ii = i;

        promptColor.addEventListener('change', (e) => {
            setCssVar(ii, e.target);
        });

        setCssVar(i, promptColor);
    }
</script>

elements.name: question6
elements.html:
<script>
    function getSliderByName(name) {
        return document.querySelector(`[data-name=${name}] input`);
    }

    function setStyleProp(slider, style) {
        var imgSlider = document.getElementById('txt4');
        imgSlider.style[style] = slider.value;
    }


    var fontWeightSlider = getSliderByName('fontWeightSlider');
    var lineHeightSlider = getSliderByName('lineHeightSlider');
    var letterSpacingSlider = getSliderByName('letterSpacingSlider');

    fontWeightSlider.addEventListener('change', (e) => {
        setStyleProp(e.target, 'font-weight');
    });

    lineHeightSlider.addEventListener('change', (e) => {
        setStyleProp(e.target, 'line-height');
    });

    letterSpacingSlider.addEventListener('change', (e) => {
        setStyleProp({ value: e.target.value + 'px' }, 'letter-spacing');
    });


    setStyleProp(fontWeightSlider, 'font-weight');
    setStyleProp(lineHeightSlider, 'line-height');
    setStyleProp(letterSpacingSlider, 'letter-spacing');
</script>

iconInverseSlider

elements.name: question6
elements.html:
<script>
    function getSliderByName(name) {
        return document.querySelector(`[data-name=${name}] input`);
    }

    function setImgInverse(slider) {
        var imgSlider = document.getElementById('img-icon-overlay');
        imgSlider.style.filter = `invert(${slider.value})`;
    }

    var inverseIconSlider = getSliderByName('iconInverseSlider');

    inverseIconSlider.addEventListener('change', (e) => {
        setImgInverse(e.target,);
    });

    setImgInverse(inverseIconSlider);
</script>
